short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Screen shot webpage with its URL and annotations, all stored and organized in the Cloud.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly capture screenshots of web pages, including their original URLs and optional user-added annotations. All screenshots are securely stored in the cloud and neatly organized in one convenient location.
